text: ebævin kavurunva movun dubalayan yayi (avamanayen yutuva) adahas karamin sitiyoda, ema janatavatama itamat bhagyayen piri (ovunge) bhumiyehi nægenahira pættada, basnahira pættada adi siyallada ayiti kara dunnemu. ebævin israyil paramparave daruvan (firavunta æti vu amarukam) ivasimen yutuva vinda dara gat hetuven (ovunta) obage deviyan dun poronduva itamat honda andamatama itu karanu. firavunda, ohuge janatavada nirmanaya kara tibu dæyada, idi kara tibu ati visala maligavanda api samatala kara dæmuvemu
